title: Happy Birthday, Rin-chan!
detail_text: <:th_ch0005/>Zzz... huh...? So loud… Hello...?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Rin-chan, were you sleeping?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Oh, huh? Kayo-chin? Yeah, I was~. It’s past midnight… You don’t usually call this late, huh? What’s up?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>S-sorry! I just thought I’d wish you a happy birthday... I knew I should’ve waited until school tomorrow. I’m sorry!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>...You couldn’t wait, so you called me?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Yeah... Um, you can go back to sleep now... Good night, Rin-chan.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Wait, wait, don’t hang up yet! Rin still hasn’t thanked you yet!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>O-okay...<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Thank nya, Kayo-chin! Not waiting until school tomorrow means you must be more excited about Rin’s birthday than Rin! That makes Rin so happy, nya!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>I don’t know if I’d say I’m more excited than you, Rin-chan, but to be honest, I’m more excited for your birthday than mine.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Huh!? Really!? But you know, Rin might be more excited for Kayo-chin’s birthday than mine! I have so much fun thinking about how I should celebrate it~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Hehe, same here. When we go to school, I’ll be sure to greet you even more, and I’ll give you a present too, so I hope you’ll look forward to it!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
